html:
5.28.17  10:55 pm   how are the songs on the lyrics page ordered?

     in the order they were recorded

     and why isn't alphabet shuffle in there? also, will you be adding your new song's lyrics to it as you'll now be making them forever?

     yes
5.28.17  7:17 pm   will you keep making short videos? i mean if you don't like making long ones no one is forcing you to

5.28.17  6:28 pm   Why should anyone waste their time asking you anything?

     i don't know but why did you
5.28.17  5:21 pm   Do you have a favourite question you've been asked?

5.28.17  5:20 pm   Does communism work?

     you'll have to try it and see

5.28.17  4:42 pm   Why are you referring to your keyboard as a piano in your shaving my piano video?

     'piano' is short for 'piano keyboard' which is what that is

5.28.17  4:37 pm   what would you define as music? at what point does it stop being sound and start becoming music?

     you will have to try and see. the good news is if you decide you don't want to decide, you don't have to decide. it might be more fun that way anyway
5.28.17  4:05 pm   Not a stab at what you do fo a living or how you act or anything just generally are you happy with your life? Seriously not trying to be passive-aggressive just asking
5.28.17  4:04 pm   What would you classify yourself as? Like idk viner YouTuber composer musician comedian someone-who-I-respect

5.28.17  4:01 pm   " 5.28.17 8:22 am Do you prefer the 12h am/pm system or the 24h system? 24 " so why use am/pm on this questions page?

     because i think that's what most people are used to

5.28.17  3:34 pm   In a previous answer you said ''"stupid" is a metaphor for being an independent person, on their own self directed educational track''. Does that mean you are against self-education or think its foolish?

     no, i think it's the right choice

5.28.17  2:52 pm   why don't you make some cool patreon rewards, like if you pay $30 you get your own jingle or something

     it makes me sad to spend time on content that most people will never see
5.28.17  2:29 pm   Why did you spell questions wrong on the top? Also, why is the q green?
5.28.17  2:19 pm   How do you get inspired to make your jokes/jingles/music/anything really I think it's really interesting how different creators come up with ideas
5.28.17  2:13 pm   How much would I have to pay you to teach me how to shave my violin?

5.28.17  1:24 pm   If I put a question mark at the end of a sentence, does it make it a question????

     in most cases. some people prefer to also switch some of the words around, but that is not always necessary

5.28.17  1:18 pm   should i kill myself

     that seems counter productive

5.28.17  1:17 pm   if a short song is picked, will you be expanding it to medium length?

     no

     or do you think some songs may still end up being less than ~20 seconds?

     there are barely any left, i pretty much did them all. there are maybe 5 left in the 16 to 20sec range, anything shorter already got picked and done. the selection process was badly skewed toward shorter material, over the last few years
5.28.17  12:22 pm   is this a creative question?

5.28.17  12:13 pm   why you don't consider yourself as a youtuber?

     youtube is not the reason i make content, nor is it the home location for any of my content. it just happens to be one if the most popular video sharing sites, so that is the reason i find it important to also post my work there. also 'youtuber' is kind of a gross sounding word i think

5.28.17  11:58 am   Is there any special reason you have a sign in your room that says "NOW HIRING ALL POSITIONS"

     it was already there

5.28.17  11:48 am   do you think mexicans are evil ?

     no

5.28.17  11:43 am   How do we fix the world?

     first try to understand how it is, and why. then try to figure out how it should be. this might give you ideas about what changes can be made
5.28.17  11:30 am   what is your favorite month?

5.28.17  11:16 am   do you think you'll be working as hard on the weekly songs as you did on hotewig

     oh hell yeah. and if there's time left over, other items too

5.28.17  10:47 am   Yo, when you play 6th chords do you include the 5th or not?

     it depends which way seems to sound better for the situation at hand

5.28.17  10:35 am   What do you auto tune with?

     my voice muscles
5.28.17  10:15 am   does barbasol work for shaving a keyboard or is there a specific requirement I need to know

5.28.17  9:48 am   As a (seemingly) non-conformist, do you think that too many people are vain and shallow by only following trends and the mainstream opinions of their times? Do you find such behavior pitiful or saddening in any way?

     seems normal to me
5.28.17  9:31 am   Why does it say thabk you, instead of thank you

5.28.17  8:56 am   do you take yourself seriously?

     oh hell yeah

     do you take your music seriously?

     oh hell yeah

5.28.17  8:41 am   Why you answer questions like "are you a banana" but don't answer if you want to marry me? You don't love? :'(

     i thought i answered that already

5.28.17  8:22 am   Do you prefer the 12h am/pm system or the 24h system?

     24
5.28.17  8:09 am   What made you want to make a YouTube channel?
5.28.17  7:12 am   Will you do live concert?
5.28.17  7:11 am   On a scale of 1-triangle how red is the alphabet?

5.28.17  7:07 am   Do you narrate your answers to these questions in musical tone?

     no
5.28.17  6:40 am   what do you regret
5.28.17  6:10 am   Why didn't you answer some of my other questions?

5.28.17  6:07 am   are your hands cold or warm

     they are a medium temperature
5.28.17  5:33 am   Will you stop making short videos? I know that more people watch the long ones but I'll miss your old content if you do stop.

5.28.17  5:01 am   how do you feel about kill bill? do you get anxious watching that movie

     tarantino movies in general have a lot of detailed violence, which is admirable and respectable, but not my cup of tea per se
5.28.17  4:59 am   What inspired you to make these videos?

5.28.17  4:05 am   what do you consider to be reasonable?

     the time space continuum

5.28.17  4:03 am   what was the most recent thing you learned musically?

     i learned that i'm gonna release new songs once a week for a very long time

5.28.17  3:40 am   where do you wish to travel?

     everywhere
5.28.17  3:39 am   any particular philosophers that has affected your thoughts?

5.28.17  3:27 am   are you a solipsist too

     i am not too familiar with that word, but i looked it up and the answer is no

5.28.17  3:15 am   Favourite music style? Or so many to say, maybe?

     the lines between the styles are not clear. that's part of the fun anyway

5.28.17  2:45 am   Have you ever tried writing chords that don't support the melody?

     sometimes, if it makes sense for the overall situation. maybe if i'm going for that 'sabotage' sort of sound
